other_tests.findings: Evidence of a diffuse-anterior horn-cell disorder or motor neuron dysfunction; findings suggestive but not diagnostic of motor neuron disease.

Conduction block, conduction delay, and dispersion of motor responses; specifically, 53% conduction block in the forearm for the right radial nerve and 56% block between the axilla and the spinal roots for the ulnar nerve.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Development of new conduction blocks observed; improvement in motor conduction noted in other nerves (e.g., right median). After two years of treatment, all conduction variables returned to normal values.
